intro: Heya, welcome! please have a read of the canvas to see <https://hackclub.enterprise.slack.com/docs/T0266FRGM/F0AEE6411E0|How this works> and other FAQ!
wrong: thats the wrong number my little hack clubber. It should be ${numberToString(number + 1)}.
twice: you cant count twice in a row. wait. :waiting-pigeon:
daily: Today, we went from ${numberToString(lastDailyCount)} (${lastDailyCount}) to ${numberToString(number)} (${number}). That's a total of +${number - lastDailyCount}.
noPerm: You don't have permissions to do that, minion.
